hints.text: The top puzzle is a sudoku. You should be able to derive a way to order everything.
You can check your answers for each row in the sudoku by entering all the numbers into the app (ex: "123456789").
Only ONE number in the grid is important. Just ONE.  Not two.  Not three.  ONE.
Overlay the grids and take all the letters under the number one.
